Container.Name: seafile-redis
Container.Overview: Redis is an open source (BSD licensed), in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker. Based on official Redis Docker image. Template has been preconfigured for running a seafile server.
Container.Changes: ### 11-14-2025 - Initial BETA template for Seafile 13 released.

Config.Name: Redis Port
Config.Description: This is Redis default connection port.
